title: MSR Evo Snowshoes - 22 in
description: The MSR Evo Snowshoes in 22 inches offer a versatile and reliable option for winter hiking. These snowshoes are built with a durable, rugged construction, featuring a lightweight design that ensures excellent flotation on snow and stability on icy terrain. The steel traction rails provide superior grip, while the adjustable bindings ensure a secure fit for various boot sizes. Whether you're new to snowshoeing or a seasoned adventurer, the MSR Evo Snowshoes are perfect for tackling both flat and hilly terrain. Experience comfort and performance with these high-quality snowshoes.
meta_title: MSR Evo Snowshoes - 22 in | Reliable Winter Hiking Gear
meta_description: Shop the MSR Evo Snowshoes in 22 in for a reliable winter hiking experience. Durable, lightweight, and equipped with steel traction rails for stability and grip. Special offer available!

title: MSR Evo Snowshoes - 30 in
description: The MSR Evo Snowshoes in 30 inches are designed for more demanding snowshoeing adventures. These snowshoes feature a rugged construction and a lightweight design that offers excellent flotation on deep snow and stability on icy terrain. Equipped with steel traction rails and adjustable bindings, the Evo Snowshoes provide a secure fit and reliable performance for all types of winter conditions. Ideal for both beginners and experienced snowshoers, the 30-inch size offers a balance of stability and comfort for various snowshoeing activities.
meta_title: MSR Evo Snowshoes - 30 in | Versatile Snowshoe for Winter Adventures
meta_description: Discover the MSR Evo Snowshoes in 30 in for versatile and reliable snowshoeing. Rugged construction, steel traction rails, and adjustable bindings for a great winter experience. Special discount available!
